title: Looking for gold players that just want to climb. End of season games becoming to hard to solo carry
body: YOO!! add my account if you are gold or plat and want to climb. Looking for mid or jgler players. I main Camille but always play all in champs, I'm great at split pushing and micro as well as macro. Just in need of another carry so we can 2v8 instead of having to 1v9 with this toxic end of season mind set people have

replies.body: Add Birdious in my promos for Gold IV I'm a support main, solid carry and vocal also.
And I carried you while your net wasn't working in our first game and still continued to duo with you. Very unsportsmanlike.
You fail to see how to climb and you are toxic towards your duo partners. You are a good support, but you butt in on arguments in game that you don't know the answer to.
